title: nunu
body: Can we get another nunu skin ? Something that emphasizes the "counter jungle" or "objective Control" part of him? Like a "nunu in your jungle" or " nunus jungle games" (shitty themes but that's besides the point) I love nunu and I wish I could buy better skins on him. Right now the sesame street one is the only good looking one. The others seem bleh.  I need more colorful nunu skins!

replies.body: Why not Master Blaster from Beyond Thunderdome?

After reading your skin proposal I've decided they need a Jumanji skin, Nunu looks either like an explorer or the wildman and Willump is a silver back gorrilla :P and Nunu could be playing the board game on top of Willump's head hahaha Kinda like counter play because board games are all about winning through that haha

I made a legit thread here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/syy8yT9q-jumanji-inspired-nunu-skin
